version_description: Various Bugfixes, Improvements and more overall Awesomeness.

• Serial exposure is back!
Take a bunch of shots in a row without delay - great for sports & action photography

• Many bugfixes and improvements

- Various bug fixes

New in 5.2:
- You can now simply swipe between Awesome Feeds!
- Improved Battery lifetime
- Much better Search experience
- Filters: Aerochrome and Beast are back!
- Fixed a bug where Distort Plugin showed UFOs
- Various UI improvements
- Fixed a bug where crop stopped working
- New free "Sharpen" Tool!
- New Venue Database
- Scroll-up in Profiles works better now
- Improved Friend-Finder

- TADAA now speaks English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Russian and Chinese!
- TADAA is now a pure editor

- Filter Extensions for your standard iOS Photos App

Now you can use your favourite photo filters directly from your camera roll!

- Several bug fixes

- Fixed a bug with unaccessible sliders in Repair and Blur plugins
- Filter Extensions for your standard iOS Photos App

Now you can use your favourite photo filters directly from your camera roll!

- Several bug fixes

version_name: brings you- iOS11 Support (including streamlined sharing) - HD Export (Finally
brings you- iOS11 Support (including streamlined sharing) - HD Export (Finally

version_description:
TADAA IS BACK!!

Thanks to all of you hanging in there and using TADAA. After what feels like an eternity, we are working on a series of awesome updates that we will be rolling out over the next few months.

This update is mainly a bugfix release, but we did add a few perks since you have been so loyal over the years :) This Version brings you

- iOS11 Support (including streamlined sharing)
- HD Export (Finally, you can save your photos in full res again, even if you're using, you know, a recent iPhone model!
- iPad Support!! This is going to be really cool for all you Pros out there!

Lots of changes to come, stay tuned! And make sure to tell your friends that TADAA IS BACK! <3

- Fixed an issue with some photos not displaying
- Fixed a crash related to some larger photos
- Various bugfixes

version_description:
Works with iOS 13! Dark mode fans since day one!

Brand new Filter: Toska!
Autumn is almost here and Toska is the perfect filter for those moody nature shots.

New Filter: Chroma!
Really make your colors POP with Chroma. But be careful and don’t overdo it - we recommend to set the intensity to somewhere between 50% and 75%. Enjoy!”

New Filter Pack: nanda!
Inspired by the Orange/Teal filters of some of our favorite Hollywood movies, nanda lets you create impressive and dramatic edits. Best to use at 60-80 %!
Sit tight for exciting new filters & features in the next few weeks! A special thanks to our amazing Tadaa Pro subscribers! Big love <3

- Fixed issues with the Russian Version where some buttons became unusable
- Fixed a number of other translation related problems (bad translations, basically)

TADAA V6 is finally here! Now adding support for :
- iPhone X
- iPhone XS
- iPhone XS Max
- iPhone XR
But that's not all! Today, we're also introducing TADAA Pro Subscription! Use all features and filters and be the first to enjoy new features! If you've purchased the Ultimate Pro Pack before, just go to settings and restore your purchases.

Edit on multiple layers with improved "snapshot" functionality. And much more!!

Bugfixes: Some users had problems accessing features after purchase. Fixed.

Fixed an issue with accessing tools while offline!

- Fixed more iOS 11.2 related crashes

- New Photo Library. Accessing your photos is now smoother and faster.
- Fixed some issues with accessing photos from iCloud
- Fixed an issue with some photos not displaying
- Fixed a crash related to some larger photos
- Various bugfixes
